item.title: FDA approves some Apple AirPods to be used as hearing aids
item.description: An upcoming Apple software update will allow some AirPods to double as over-the-counter hearing aids. Only 1 in 6 American adults with hearing loss wears hearing aids.

item.title: Pioneering ballerina Michaela DePrince dies at 29
item.description: DePrince, born in Sierra Leone, lost both her parents during the country’s civil war. She became the youngest principal dancer at the Dance Theatre of Harlem and later joined the Boston Ballet.

item.title: George Washington established the presidency. How much of it would he recognize now?
